title: Talking About Life Experiences
description: Listen to two friends catching up and sharing their recent life experiences.

audio.text:
Sarah: Hey Mike! I haven't seen you in ages! How have you been?
Mike: Sarah! Wow, it's been so long. I've been great, actually. A lot has changed since we last met.
Sarah: Really? Tell me everything! What have you been up to?
Mike: Well, the biggest news is that I've finally graduated from university. I finished my degree last month.
Sarah: Congratulations! That's amazing! Have you found a job yet?
Mike: Yes, I've just started working at a marketing company downtown. I've only been there for two weeks, but I'm really enjoying it so far.
Sarah: That's wonderful! I remember you always wanted to work in marketing.
Mike: Exactly! It's been my dream for years. What about you? Have you done anything exciting recently?
Sarah: Actually, yes! I've just come back from traveling. I've been to Southeast Asia for three months.
Mike: Wow! Which countries have you visited?
Sarah: I've been to Thailand, Vietnam, and Indonesia. It was the best experience of my life. I've learned so much about different cultures.
Mike: Have you ever traveled alone before?
Sarah: No, this was my first time traveling solo. I was nervous at first, but it has really changed me. I've become much more confident and independent.
Mike: That sounds incredible. Have you already decided what to do next?
Sarah: I've actually just accepted a job offer. I'm going to work as a travel blogger!
Mike: No way! That's perfect for you. You've always been a great writer.
Sarah: Thanks! I've never thought I could turn my passion into a career, but here I am.
Mike: We should celebrate! Have you had lunch yet?
Sarah: No, not yet. Let's grab something to eat and catch up more!
